name: A Planted Out Little Veggie Patch!
description:
The Little Veggie Patch crew will come and install and prepare a No-Dig Garden, and then plant out  with seasonal vegetables. 
The package includes a recycled, lined crate layered with organic growing material, including Peas Straw, Compost and Worm Poo. Then planted out with seasonal Veggies and Herbs.  All that is left for you to do is water, wait and harvest.

The Dimensions are 122cm W x 122cm L x 73cm H.

***METRO MELBOURNE ONLY***

name: A Little Herb Box
description:
The Little Herb Box contains a mix of Sage, Oregano and Thyme.
The dimensions are 56cm x 42cm x 23cm.

***Delivery to METRO MELBOURNE ONLY***

name: Heirloom Tomato Seed Gift Pack
description:
Pack includes one packet each of all four varieties of heirloom seeds. 
The four varieties are Burnley Sure Crop, Black Russian, Yellow Pear and Tommy Toe.

name: Little Veggie Crate - PICK UP ONLY OPTION
description:
These crates make great instant Little Veggie Patches for the budget conscious. They are also great for Schools, Kindergartens and Child Care Centers looking to start up a Kitchen Garden.

There is no major construction required. Upon arrival of your ‘Little Veggie Crate’ all you have to do is fill the crate by first laying it with straw, then topping it up with a good quality organic compost and presto!….you have an Instant No Dig Garden. Each crate comes lined with tough plastic to stop your ingredients seeping out.

For further options check out our 'Little Veggie Crate' pricing page.
http://littleveggiepatchco.com.au/products/apple-crates/ 

The Dimensions are 122cm W x 122cm L x 73cm H.

***PICK UP FROM MOORABBIN***

name: Worm Poo ( Castings)
description:
Our 10L bag of worm castings is a fantastic natural fertilizer that promotes good bacteria growth in your soil and is packed full of readily available nutrients for your plants.
 
Use Worm Poo when planting out your vegetable seedlings by spreading in the hole/trench or simply sprinkle over the topsoil around the plants. Seeds can be propagated directly into our Worm Poo to improve germination performance. 
 
Worm Poo is a rich, chocolate colour and completely odourless. It is to the gardener what truffles are to the cook.

WormPoo:  Made by Worms!

***SHIPPING TO METRO MELBOURNE ONLY***
or pick up form Moorabbin
